item.description:
Dear Ensemble,

Following on a solid show last Sunday at Pine Street, we will work with Jason to address sticking points for the games we performed, as identified during our Self Diagnosis, and continue to develop our overall improv skillset. We will also talk a bit about how we can remember to translate the skills we learn during rehearsal to the live audience.

Until next week!
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Closed Rehearsal Ensemble A
